responsibilities: Built an online mentorship platform for professional skills learning, which achieved annual revenue of $500,000 and attracted over 60,000 followers

Launched a job seeker tool to help users find the latest job openings and submit their resumes automatically by AI, which captured over 200,000 impressions and 4000 early users on Linkedin within the first week of launch
Lead a team of 8 persons including AI researchers, designers, and software engineers, building a short video creation tool to help knowledge workers promote their services and courses

Established on-device Google Assistant program which leveraged AI and edge computing technologies to reduce user friction and latency, and launched it at Made By Google event impacting over 10M home devices
Led cross-departmental project as the product owner to build local Smart Home framework equivalent to Home Automation server, providing users a local home experience with 3X faster queries execution
Created the roadmap to build an AI-based ranking engine that personalized the contents delivery on Smart Displays to the end users, increasing the user engagement with the screen from 11% to 18%
Served as the lead product manager and designed a series of software products which became the foundation supporting autonomous driving system's workflows and a fleet of trucks' operation
Optimized the data pipeline from data collection to post-processing, reducing the data idle time by over 30%
Owned HD mapping team's development and productization, doubled the speed of map generation by transforming human controlled process into modularized semi-automated product
Invented a technique using infrared camera and computer vision to capture finger touching points when human naturally grasping packages, filing a US patent application of my invention
Developed a software application which automated the images capturing and 3D point clouds storage process
Tutored operating team to work on my system, and wrote the code specifics as well as user manual for reference

Built a cross-functional team of six people to work on an information exchange platform from ideation to MVP launch, which enabled college students in Beijing to find immediate help with everyday tasks
Defined the user growth plan and achieved over 30,000 users with 6,000+ DAU within the first year
Achieved monthly revenue of $12000 by providing VIP features and building cooperation with local businesses
Conducted user experience survey and competitor analysis on live video products; provided contexts for A/B testing
Designed the reputation system and reporting feature to enhance user's gaming experience on Tencent Game Platform
Launched the 4th anniversary program of League of Legends on WeChat platform, visualizing players' gaming records and exciting moments, attracting over 3 million viewing times

education.institution: Carnegie Mellon University, School of Computer Science
